realtime_memories.content: User preferences: Be explicit about required actions. Don't assume context. Prefers directness over hedging. Wants parallel agent swarms for multi-page reviews. Kill ports command on WSL: lsof -ti :5173 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :5174 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :8000 | xargs -r kill -9. Backend start: cd /home/mattb/projects/dashboard_interface_project/backend && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000

Architecture: Frontend (Vite/React) on port 5173, Backend (FastAPI/uvicorn) on port 8000. Frontend API config: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1 to base URL. Property detail subpages are tabs within /properties/:id. Main DB: PostgreSQL at localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data (30 properties seeded, 25/30 deals have extraction data). Data pipeline: 28 Excel files -> 26 properties, 30,394 values across 11 categories. IRR: LP_RETURNS_IRR/MOIC as fallback (0.12-0.23). Key types: leveredIrr/leveredMoic/unleveredIrr(nullable)/unleveredMoic(nullable). operations.expenses has 12 categories + total. financing.lender and maturityDate are nullable.

COMPLETED Features (Tasks 12-30, commits through 3a275e8): FinancialsTab double-counting fix. OperationsTab rewrite (9 line items, donut chart). Performance metrics backend fallback. Standalone Transactions page removed. Deal Timeline with 9 extraction-enriched metrics. 6 SharePoint deal stages. DSCR div-by-zero fix. Mapping coordinate validation. maturityDate/lender real data. UP042 StrEnum migration. Underwriting Modal full-screen layout with color-coded KPIs. Deals Kanban fallback. Reporting Templates mock fallbacks. Analytics Cap Rate vs DSCR chart. Analytics dateRange wired. Market endpoints async with DB-first + static fallback. Geocoding service created. All CI green: 328 frontend + 1055 backend tests pass.

MARKET DATA PROJECT (in progress Feb 4 2026): User wants to replace ALL static market data with real data. Plan: create dedicated PostgreSQL DB 'dashboard_market_data' on port 5433 (user has another project on 5432). Credentials: DB_USER=postgres, DB_PASSWORD=Wildcats777!!. Has FRED API key and Census API key. Extraction plan: full history first pull, incremental updates after, automated monthly on 15th. 6 static disclaimers + hardcoded sparklineData in frontend need removal. Backend market_data.py already async with DB-first fallback pattern. Key question pending: CoStar submarket data (rent/vacancy/cap rate by submarket) not available via FRED/Census — need user input on source. Also asked about interest rate scope (mockInterestRates.ts). market_expansion_analysis project is on Windows side of WSL.
Consolidated from 11 entries down to 4. Waiting for your answers to the questions above before proceeding.

Apologies — I asked you questions and was waiting for answers, but you already said to let you know if I had questions **before starting work**. Let me re-read your message more carefully.

Looking

Consolidated from 10 memories down to 5. Updated the current_status to reflect pipeline completion, merged port 5432 correction into tech_decision, and cleared realtime_memories.
The FRED background task completed successfully — we already verified its output earlier (154,899 records across 17 series). All data extractions are done and the pipeline is fully operational. No a
Backend tests also completed — 1055 passed, 0 failures, as we already confirmed. Everything is clean. Nothing for you to do here.
Let's run git commit and push commands to memorialize this important update, then I will run the dashboard to review the updates.
